sect1.title: Subversion repository
sect1.para: The source for the SSCLI with my changes incorporated are maintained using the Subversion version control system. The Subversion command line client is available for a large number of platforms, including Windows, and can be obtained from http://subversion.tigris.org

sect2.title: Checking out the source
sect2.para: Using the svn command line client, the source code can be obtained from http://ankhsvn.com/svn/masters/trunk/sscli/:
The repository can also be browsed in a regular web browser by pasting the above URL into the address field.
